title: Malavika Menon Looks Back at 2025 With Gratitude | Malavika Menon Looks Back at 2025 With Gratitude
text:
Malavika Menon Looks Back at 2025 With Gratitude
Malavika Menon began the new year by sharing a happy moment on Instagram, dressed in a soft white saree.
By:Priya Chowdhary Nuthalapti| 1 Jan 2026 12:29 PM IST
Malavika Menon began the new year by sharing a happy moment on Instagram, dressed in a soft white saree. In the photo, she looks confident and peaceful, standing against a plain background. She described 2025 as a beautiful year filled with blessings, learning, love, and new paths. She expressed gratitude for everything the year gave her and shared that she feels ready for more in the coming days. She welcomed 2026 with hope, wishing for it to be her best chapter yet, and ended her message by sending New Year wishes to her loved ones.
She also gave credit to the creative team behind the photos. Makeup was done by Vasan Makeup Artist. The photos were captured by Plan B Actions and Jibin Artist. The saree was designed by Blackgold Designing Studio, while the jewellery was from Goldencup Rental Jewellery.
Malavika Menon has been active in films since 2012. She began her career with the Malayalam album Ente Kannan and made her film debut the same year with Nidra.
Her first lead role came in the film 916, where she played Meera. Over the years, she worked in Malayalam, Tamil, and Telugu films. In Tamil cinema, she appeared in films like Ivan Veramathiri, Bramman, Vethu Vettu, and Pei Mama. In Malayalam, she became known for roles in films such as Nadan, Joseph, Porinju Mariam Jose, Njan Marykutty, and Paappan.
Malavika also explored different kinds of characters. She played a dancer, singer, student, sister, and even appeared in short films and cameo roles. Her performance in Devayanam earned appreciation and won recognition at the Goodknight Awards in 2017.
In recent years, she has continued to stay active with films like Oruthee, CBI 5: The Brain, Puzhu, Kaduva, Padmini, Kurukkan and Thankamani.
Photo Courtesy : Instagram
